languages.text: Отражение {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} — это показатель того, на сколько снижается {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g} при каждом {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g} по персонажу.
languages.original_text: Deflection determines the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} deducted whenever an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the character.

traits.locale_text: Отражение урона — это показатель того, на сколько снижается {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g} при каждом попадании по персонажу.

traits.locale_text: Deflection determines the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} deducted whenever an enemy hits the character.

languages.text: Ablenkung bestimmt die Höhe des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g}, der abgezogen wird, wenn ein Gegner den Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} bestimmt die Höhe des {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}Schadens{/g}, der abgezogen wird, wenn ein Gegner den Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g}.

languages.text: La déflexion détermine les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} déduits chaque fois qu'un ennemi {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} le personnage.
languages.original_text: Deflection determines the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} deducted whenever an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the character.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} détermine les {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}dégâts{/g} déduits chaque fois qu'un ennemi {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}porte un coup{/g} au personnage.

languages.text: 偏转代表当敌人{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}该角色时，该角色拥有的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}减值。
languages.original_text: Deflection determines the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} deducted whenever an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the character.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}代表当敌人{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}该角色时，该角色拥有的{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}减值。

languages.original_text: Deflection determines the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} deducted whenever an enemy hits the character.

languages.text: El desvío determina la cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que se reduce cada vez que un enemigo {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} al personaje.
languages.original_text: Deflection determines the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} deducted whenever an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the character.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} determina la cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}daño{/g} que se reduce cada vez que un enemigo {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacta{/g} al personaje.

languages.text: 敵がキャラクターを{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}した際の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}の低減量はディフレクショを基に決まる。
languages.original_text: Deflection determines the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} deducted whenever an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the character.

traits.locale_text: 敵がキャラクターを{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}攻撃{/g}した際の{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}ダメージ{/g}の低減量は{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を基に決まる。

languages.text: Saptırma, düşmanlardan biri karaktere her {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} düşülecek {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} miktarını belirler.
